name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: I've a feeling we're not in a Sandbox anymore

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Warns you that you are in a production instance of Salesforce with a noticable yellow banner

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Of interest to Salesforce Developers and Administrators only.

This utility places a warning yellow bar across the top of your Salesforce page and also changes the favicon when you are working on a production pod of salesforce (eg: na1, eu1, ap1).
